  • Method Details

    • addExperience

      public BaseUserResponse addExperience(String id, ExperienceDTO experience, String token)
      Add an experience to a candidate.
      Parameters:
      id - User id of the candidate who adds the experience
      experience - Experience to add
      token - String - Access token from the user who adds the experience
      Returns:
      BaseUserResponse containing the response from the API

    • addExperienceForUserManager

      public UUID addExperienceForUserManager(String id, ExperienceDTO experience, String token)

    • deleteExperience

      public BaseUserResponse deleteExperience(String id, ExperienceDTO experience, String token) throws org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException
      Remove an experience from a candidate.
      Parameters:
      id - User id of the candidate who removes the experience
      experience - Experience to remove.
      token - String - Access token from the user who ask to remove the experience.
      Returns:
      BaseUserResponse containing the response from the API.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - If the user is not authorized.

    • createExperienceRequest

      private ExperienceDTO createExperienceRequest(ExperienceDTO experience, String token) throws org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException
      Send a POST experience request to the experience API.
      Parameters:
      experience - Experience to send.
      token - String - Access token from the user who sent the experience.
      Returns:
      ExperienceDTO containing the response from the API.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - If the experience is invalid.

    • removeExperienceRequest

      private void removeExperienceRequest(ExperienceDTO experience, String token) throws org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException
      Send a DELETE experience request to the experience API.
      Parameters:
      experience - Experience to remove.
      token - String - Access token from the user who sent the experience.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - If the experience is invalid.

    • validateUser

      private void validateUser(String id, String token) throws org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException
      Check if the user is valid.
      Parameters:
      id - User id of the candidate who receives the experience.
      token - String - Access token from the user who sent the experience.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - If the experience is invalid.
